meanings.sent1: I grilled a delicious hamburger for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My favorite fast food is a hamburger from the drive-thru.
meanings.sent3: Why did the patty of ground beef go to the gym? To get stronger and become a hamburger!
meanings.sent4: The hamburger of ground beef sizzled on the hot grill, filling the air with a tempting aroma.
meanings.sent5: The juicy hamburger was so tasty that it made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a patty of ground beef in a bun.
meanings.sent1: At the barbecue, everyone enjoyed a delicious hamburger in a bun.
meanings.sent2: I like to add ketchup and pickles to my hamburger sandwich.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hamburger in a bun break up with the hot dog? They couldn't ketchup anymore!
meanings.sent4: The hamburger in a bun was a tower of flavor, a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling hamburger in a bun drew everyone to the backyard grill.
